text: Jens Johnnie "Little Evil" Pulver (born December 6, 1974 in Sunnyside, Washington) is an American mixed martial artist (MMA). He was the first Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) lightweight champion, and was a coach on The Ultimate Fighter 5 reality show, which aired on Spike TV. He is currently signed as a featherweight with World Extreme Cagefighting (WEC), which is owned by Zuffa (the parent company of the UFC). ==Other websites== *Jens Pulver official website *Video Interview about The Ultimate Fighter 5 *May 2007 interview Category:American mixed martial artists Category:1974 births Category:Living people
title: Jens Pulver
